description: Looking for a delicious family-friendly dinner recipe? Make this magnificent pork roast with a warm, herby roasted potato salad.
keywords: Dinner,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pork,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Roast pork with warm herby potatoes & feta salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths simply steam baby white potatoes
600g Woolworths pork loin roast with herbs & spices
0.25 bunch dill, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Microwave potatoes according to packet instructions. Cool for 5 minutes, then halve.

Place pork and potatoes in a large roasting pan and drizzle with 1 1/2 tbs oil. Roast for 30 minutes. Scatter feta over potatoes. Roast for a further 20 minutes or until pork is cooked through and potatoes are golden and tender. Loosely cover with foil and rest for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, place vinegar, mustard, chives, dill and remaining oil in a screw-top jar. Season with pepper. Secure lid and shake to combine.
Transfer potato mixture to a large bowl and drizzle with 2/3 of the dressing. Transfer pork to a board. Slice and serve with potato mixture, rocket and remaining dressing.
